dict.string:
on alfred_script(q) -- Alfred 自带环境变量等 tell application "System Events" set isRunning to exists (processes where name is "iTerm2") end tell
tell application "iTerm2" activate if not isRunning then delay 0.3 end if tell current window tell current session -- 永远用 tmux new-window -A 来执行 Alfred 输入命令 write text "tmux new-window -A -n alfred '\''" & q & "'\''" end tell end tell end tell end alfred_script
